item.title: Florida man convicted of killing woman abducted from office is set to be executed
item.description: A man convicted of kidnapping a woman from an insurance office in the early 1980s and killing her is set for execution in Florida

item.title: Hurricane Erin's massive waves threaten to isolate North Carolina's Outer Banks
item.description: Hurricane Erin is expected to impact the Outer Banks in North Carolina, sending massive waves crashing into the islands

item.title: Menendez brothers to be evaluated by parole board for release after 30 years in prison
item.description: The Menendez brothers are set to make their cases for parole this week
